data.eml:eml: Two new species of gorgonian octocorals from the Tropical Eastern Pacific Biogeographic Region (Cnidaria, Anthozoa, Gorgoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breedy, Odalisca, Williams, Gary C, Guzman, Hector M (2013): Two new species of gorgonian octocorals from the Tropical Eastern Pacific Biogeographic Region (Cnidaria, Anthozoa, Gorgoniidae). ZooKeys 350: 75-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.350.6117, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.350.6117
